Zillow

At Zillow Group, our benefits reflect our culture and whatâ€™s important to our employees and their families. Our benefits are competitive, comprehensive and designed to encourage work-life balance, not burnout. Including:

* Discretionary Time Off

* 100% employee premiums for health care

* 4% 401k match

* Commuter & Gym Subsidies

* 16 weeks maternal leaves, 8 weeks parental leave
